mean_cn: n. 【金融】透支，【金融】透支额；  v. 【金融】透支
mean_en: an amount of money that is spent by someone using a bank account that is more than the amount available in the account :an amount that is overdrawn from an account
word_etyma: over过度+draft提款→[金融] 透支，透支额
short_phrase: an overdraft on his card's account
sentence: I took out an overdraft to pay for my new things.
sentence_trans: 我透支了自己的卡来买买买。
